title: "But I wasn't toxic!!!"
body:
Dear everyone,

If you feed 0/6 in the lane phase ms build completely glass cannon into late game,

Then spam surrender@20 when you keep feeding,

Then whine when we trade your worthless ass for three kills baron and a tower,

Then rage quit because we are winning but you're still spending most of your time dead, and reconnect 2 minutes before we lose and say " lol no leaver buster for me"

Then really, I'd just rather if you insulted my mother a couple times and I would rather play with a toxic non-moron 10 times out of 10. 

Thank you.
